name: FRANZ FURY
description:
In the world after the "Greatest Boom of Booms" the mutant Franz Fury and his cat and best friend Hans lived a peacefull live of looting and parties.
After a hard night of booze and gambling, Hans is gone and Franz car Betty was completely stripped down.

Play as Franz in this bloody meltdown party and
  • Find and save Hans
  • Upgrade your car Betty and make it the fastest and toughest piece of steel in the wasteland
  • Meet friends and enemies on your revenge trip
  • Use your car as a weapon. Equip it with guns, flamethrowers or just ride over stuff
  • Enjoy the old-school semi-pixelart graphics!

Enjoy the brutal metal soundtrack and paint the road with blood and guts!
